summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Panel, Seller Pages, and KYC features. All backend APIs pass (14/14 tests). Frontend UI fully functional with proper role-based access control.
passed_tests: Super admin login (super@admin.com / admin12) - successful authentication
Admin dashboard displays correct stats (pending_listings, pending_kyc, disputed_orders, active_orders)
Admin dashboard quick action buttons (Review Listings, Review KYC, Resolve Disputes)
Admin pending listings page (/admin/listings) - loads correctly with empty state
Admin KYC review page (/admin/kyc) - loads correctly with empty state
Admin disputes page (/admin/disputes) - loads correctly with empty state
Seller My Listings page (/my-listings) - loads correctly with status filter and create button
KYC submission page (/kyc) - loads correctly with document upload form
Role-based navigation - Admin sees 'Admin Panel' menu item in user dropdown
Role-based route protection - Backend correctly denies admin endpoints to regular users (403)
Super admin dashboard shows Platform Overview section with additional stats
Super admin sees Total Users, Verified Sellers, Active Listings, Total Volume cards
Backend API: /api/admin/dashboard returns correct stats structure
Backend API: /api/kyc/admin/pending returns paginated KYC submissions
Backend API: /api/admin/disputes returns paginated disputed orders
seed_data_creation: Created test user testuser_role2@test.com for role-based access testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel and seller pages fully tested. All admin routes (/admin, /admin/listings, /admin/kyc, /admin/disputes) working correctly. Role-based access control verified - regular users get 403 on admin endpoints. Super admin has additional Platform Overview section. KYC submission page has document upload form. My Listings page has status filter dropdown.
